bot_config {"Name": "hortbot", "Dedupe": "memory"}
channel {"id": 1, "user_id": 1, "name": "foobar", "prefix": "+", "bot_name": "hortbot"}
simple_command {"channel_id": 1, "name": "pan", "message": "FOUND THE (_PARAMETER_CAPS_), HAVE YE?"}

handle @id=9b2d2c0d-8a99-44b0-abe0-c4c9eeeb99aa;room-id=1 :nobodu!nobodu@nobodu.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+pan working command
send hortbot #foobar [HB] FOUND THE WORKING COMMAND, HAVE YE?
